speaker: narrator
dialog: The sketchy zookeeper strikes you down with a final blow, and you fall on your butt.

speaker: narrator
dialog: Before you pass out, he leans over you, and hisses in your ear:

speaker: narrator
dialog: "You never stood a chance, you scummy, good for nothing PETA lover!"

speaker: narrator
dialog: You pass out, and as your eyes close you hear the zookeeper opening the animals cages, and the animals cries as they are forced from their cage.

speaker: narrator
dialog: You lost this one. Sorry champ. You can restart and try again if you want. Thanks for playing!
